abstract: China’s securities regulator said it would review China Everbright Bank’s application for an initial public offering in Shanghai next Monday, Reuters reported.
snippet: China’s securities regulator said it would review China Everbright Bank’s application for an initial public offering in Shanghai next Monday, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: China’s securities regulator said it would look at China Everbright Bank‘s application for an initial public offering in Shanghai next Monday, Reuters reported.

headline.main: China to Review Everbright’s Shanghai I.P.O.
